name: Pete's Wisdom Multiple Choice Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Pete is usually seen wearing this clothing item.
questions.explanation:
Trenchcoat.

	Other comic book characters that have worn trenchcoats include John Constantine of "Hellblazer" and The Question, found in the DC Comics universe.

questions.correct: He can throw blades of energy
options: He can turn his hands into metallic claws
He can fire bullets of energy
questions.explanation:
He can throw blades of energy.

	These "hotknives" have gotten Pete out of more than one sticky situation. Curiously enough, "hotknives" is a slang word for drug paraphernalia.

questions.text: Wisdom is a former agent for Black Air.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Before joining Excalibur, Pete Wisdom worked for the covert organization Black Air. His time there is largely undocumented, but has occasionally come back to haunt him.

questions.text: What is the name of Pete's sister?
questions.explanation:
Romany.

	Romany was introduced in the three-issue miniseries "Pryde and Wisdom" by Warren Ellis, the British comic book writer who created Pete Wisdom. Usually linked with Colossus, Kitty Pryde had been romantically involved with Wisdom for a time.

questions.text: Wisdom faked the loss of this body part.
questions.explanation:
An eye.

	In "X-Force", which briefly featured Wisdom, Pete was seen sporting an eyepatch, although this was a deception. The buck doesn't stop there, Wisdom has also faked his own death.

questions.text: Wisdom killed all members of a terrorist cell in this country.
questions.explanation:
Thailand.

	On a mission from the British government, Wisdom assassinated every single member of a terrorist cell in Thailand. Wisdom's mutant power made him an ideal killing machine.

questions.text: While working for M-16, Wisdom was romantically involved with a woman who turned out to be a contract killer.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Sari St. Hubbins was a contract killer hired to kill none other than Queen Elizabeth! Wisdom chose duty over love and subdued Sari, turning her over to authorities. This altercation made Wisdom question his place within M-16.

questions.text: After the death of his friend Culley, WIsdom and Shadowcat investigated this facility
questions.explanation:
Dream Nails.

	Dream Nails was investigating an alien race known as the Uncreated, whose bacteria killed Culley. Wisdom was able to destroy the facility.

questions.text: Wisdom was severely beaten by which member of Excalibur?
questions.explanation:
Colossus.

	Colossus was mentally unstable at the time and furious over losing Shadowcat to Wisdom. Wisdom needed to be confined to a wheelchair for a few weeks as a result of the beating.

questions.text: In the House of M timeline, Wisdom is a bodyguard to which character?
questions.explanation:
Captain Britain.

	The Scarlet Witch used her reality-altering powers to create a world where mutants were the majority, not humans. Regular humans were looked down upon, and Magneto ruled the world.
